price: Ба ростӣ, ки Мо осмони дунёро бо зевари ситорагон оростем
arabic: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلۡكَوَاكِبِ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā zayyannā al-samāa al-dun'yā bizīnatin al-kawākibi
